text: The Rose Tattoo is a 1955 American comedy-drama movie directed by Daniel Mann and was based on the play of the same name by Tennessee Williams. It stars Burt Lancaster, Anna Magnani, Marissa Pavan, Ben Cooper, Virginia Grey, Jo Van Fleet and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 8 Oscars and won 3 Academy Awards in 1956. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 comedy movies Category:1955 drama movies Category:1950s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Daniel Mann
title: The Rose Tattoo
